jSimPack

Class FutureEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jSimPack.FutureEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<FutureEvent>

    public class FutureEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<FutureEvent>
    Data object that encodes event information. These objects are scheduled and executed by FutureEventList.

      • handler

        final FutureEventListener handler

    • Constructor Detail

      • FutureEvent

        FutureEvent(FutureEventListener handler,
           SimTime when,
           java.lang.Object callback)
        Parameters:
        handler - the class that gets the callback when the event occurs
        when - wall clock time for the event to happen
        callback - data that is passed back to the listener when the event occurs this allows listeners that get more than one event to distinguish between them.

    • Method Detail

      • isScheduled

        public boolean isScheduled()
        Returns:
        true if the event has been scheduled but has not occured yet

      • expire

        public void expire()
        mark the event as having occurred
